MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH54 postcode area of Livingston. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:12pm. Our engineers have arrived at Adambrae Parks East substation to investigate a possible blown fuse and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:15am. When we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:44pm on Saturday, 19 December 2020
